title.title: About me
title.content: On this page you will come to learn more about me including the more unknown/fun things about me, my hobbies and my last few years as software developer student

items.title: Some facts about me
items.content:
Hello. My name is Daniel Vermeulen and im a 18 year old Software Developer student at MediaCollege Amsterdam. Before going down this carreer path i got my MAVO diploma on Atlas College Copernicus highschool in Hoorn.

 Currently i love hanging out with friends, family and my girlfriend. Also ive been playing video games since i was young as a hobby. but managed to turn that into working with computers and programming

items.title: Fun fact 1
items.content:
I speak Dutch, English, Spanish

 (Understand but dont speak)
 basic German and French

items.title: Fun fact 2
items.content: I used to play handbal for 6 years when i was young

items.title: Fun fact 3
items.content: I like self studying if its a jubject i enjoy

items.title: Fun fact 4
items.content: I love a good snack or drink on a friday night

items.title: Pitch event
items.text: I did a pitching event with my co-workers for our start-up company. The event was just like shark tank
items.link: We ended up winning the entire event solidifying our company idea as one of the best

items.title: Gaming event
items.text:
Back when i used to play video games as a hobby i managed to qualify for an esports competition
 featuring the best of the Netherlands at that time

items.title: Love for dogs
items.text: I really love dogs. small dogs like boomers in particular. ive had a sweet doggie at home for years

items.title: Famous eraser
items.text:
When i was young i really liked a penguin eraser and called it Knoert. so i posted some pictures of it
 online and it got a few hundred followers.
items.link: The images have since been deleted
